name: HDRP_VectorField_ForceSourcesViz_2019-12-22
description:
HDRP Vector Field Tests series, part 2 of 6
rendered and captured in real-time

started porting my systems to HDRP in late 2019, using all custom shader (no use of shader graph, vfx graph, etc)

this series showcases tests of the vector field system, as well as the debug rendering of the field itself

all natural process: no use of noise, patterns or external lookups in the sim itself
